isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - REMOVE - REMOVE FENDERS

svcprocinfo.para: The fenders on the 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA) and 5500 i (SFA), 5600 i (SBA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood are part of the hood assembly and are not removable.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Fenders on 5600 i (SBA) With Optional Butterfly Hood

note.para: Each fender may be removed and installed separately.

step1.para: Release hood latches on the left (driver) side of the hood and raise left side hood panel.
To remove fender and splash panel, use the following procedures, left (driver) side fender assembly is shown in the following procedures and figures).
Disconnect headlight and directional light wiring to fender assembly being removed.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 46 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove three hex bolts (Item 1) and three hex lock nuts (Item 2, View A - A) with flat washers, rubber spacer, springs and hardened flat washers (Items 3 thru 6, View A - A) from the fender support bracket (Item 7) and fender support angle (Item 8) on the front of the fender (Item 9).

figure.caption: Figure 46. Remove Fender Assembly on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood

step1.para: Refer to Figure 47 for all items in parentheses.

Remove three flange hex bolts (Item 1) and flange hex lock nuts (Item 2) from the fender and rear fender support (Items 3 and 4). This will allow the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 3 and 6) to be removed from the vehicle, and the mud flap assembly (Item 5) to be removed from the rear of the fender.

figure.caption: Figure 47. Remove Fender Support and Mud Flap Assembly on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 48 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To separate the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 1 and 2), remove rear fender channel (Item 3) under the fender.

Remove five hex bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 4), three from the fender and two from the splash panel, and remove rear fender channel (Item 3) from the fender and splash panel (Items 1 and 2).
Remove four hex bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 5) on the top flange of the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 1 and 2).

figure.caption: Figure 48. Remove Splash Panel and Rear Fender Channel on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. HEX BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT
5. HEX BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Also remove two hex bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 1) on the front flange of the fender and splash panel assembly (Items 2 and 3).

figure.caption: Figure 49. Remove Fender and Fender Reinforcement on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT
4. HEX BOLT, FLAT WASHER AND HEX LOCK NUT

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Remove two hex bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Item 4) from the fender reinforcement (Item 5) and splash panel (Item 3), and separate the fender (Item 1, Figure 50) from the splash panel (Item 2, Figure 50).

figure.caption: Figure 50. Remove Fender and Splash Panel on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood

step1.para: Repeat this procedure to remove and disassemble the right (passenger) side fender and splash panel assembly.
